headline: Us Donate 500 Million Pfizer Doses Developing Countries
summary: On Thursday, the White House announced plans for the U.S. to donate 500 million vaccine doses around the world over the next year. The U.S. will reportedly spend $3.5 billion to buy and donate the vaccines.As demand for vaccines falls in the U.S. and other parts of the world experience shortages, some have called on the U.S. to step in.
